article.title: Orono Receives Award for Threat Agent Capture and Detection System
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Orono Spectral Solutions Incorporated, Orono, Maine, was awarded a $7 million contract to research an integrated monitoring platform that includes threat agent capture, concentration, and presentation and detection system for agent testing. U.S. Army Research, Development and Engineering Command Contracting Center, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
